messages.content:
🎉 Welcome to the enhanced Connectra chat! You can now:

• **Send rich text messages** with formatting
• 📎 **Upload files and images** with captions
• 📝 **Create and share blog posts**
• 😊 **Use emojis** in your messages
• 💬 **Enjoy real-time messaging**

Try uploading an image, writing some **bold** or *italic* text, or create your first blog post!
